title: Weather data is inaccurate
answer:
Go to Weather. For EMUI 2.0 or 2.3, select ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=177039) to update weather data. For EMUI 3.0, drag your finger downwards to update weather data. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=177040)

 Before updating weather data, please ensure that your phone has a mobile data or Wi-Fi connection. 

 If weather data is still inaccurate after updating, it could be because data for that weather app has not yet been updated. Please try updating later. 

 Download other similar weather apps and see if weather data is accurate. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=177041)

 Apps cannot provide entirely reliable weather data. It is recommended that you consult the data provided by the local meteorological bureau.
